first_para: Sir Antony Brian Baldry (born 10 July 1950) is a British Conservative Party politician who was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Banbury from 1983 to 2015.

full.extract: Sir Antony Brian Baldry (born 10 July 1950) is a British Conservative Party politician who was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Banbury from 1983 to 2015.
full.title: Tony Baldry
